Text.Value: I'll be the judge of that. Stow your weapons, put your hands up, and walk into the light - slowly.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [HarperScouts] still aiming. [Yonas] repositioning to better aim at PLYR (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*

Text.Value: My name is [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Who are you?
Someone who will snap both you and your weapons in two unless you lower them.
Keep in the light! You - who the hells are you?!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [HarperScout]s are walking with weapons and torches drawn. They react and step back as [PLYR] lands. The Harpers reform with weapons aimed at PLYR., Can use SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_DropLand_PLYR & *DUPE* SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_WalkStartled_toIdle <LoganP>

Lassandra gathers her wits immediately after her intiial shock and addresses the Harpers, afraid they've leapt into the darkness. Points weapon at player .
EditorData.NodeContext: 'Keep in the light' is to her HArpers. Address is to player. She points her sword at the player, ready to strike in an instant if necessary.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Player jumps from a high ledge and lands amidst the Harpers.

Text.Value: Get ready to fight.
His soul... consumed by the darkness. Not a good sign.
Not taking requests, love. Now put your hands up and walk over here - slowly.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [HarperScouts] still aiming. [Yonas] repositioning to better aim at PLYR (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>

Text.Value: Harpers - you heard the man. TO ARMS!
Harpers - you heard the woman. TO ARMS!
Harpers - you heard them. TO ARMS!

EditorData.NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

Text.Value: Answer me!

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Lassandra] still idling with sword drawn at player (_LOOP from SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_Walk_toStartled_toIdle) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Sword still pointed at player.

Text.Value: Run.
It'll be you unless you show yourself. Come out - slowly.
...Yonas?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ShadowYonas] emerges from the shadows, shambling towards the Harpers.  [Meygan] has her torch held out. (HUM_M_Rig_SCENE_SCL_ShadowYonas_Emerge)  <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A shape moves in the shadows, slowly approaching
EditorData.NodeContext: quietly
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Transformed Yonas appears out of the darkness
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Transformed Yonas appears out of the darkness

Text.Value: I am but a simple monk - I am no threat.
Yonas - look out!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Yonas] is tumbled down the incline (SCL_HarperScouts_Yonas_Fall).  After [Meygan] calls out (check if V.O anim is appropriate), *DUPE* [Harpers] move in closer together, facing the creature (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_React_toCreature) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]
EditorData.NodeContext: Meygan notices the tentacle. Sudden shriek of alarm.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] ShadowCreature appears and takes a swipe at Yonas. Yonas dodges causing him to trip and fall down a hill into the fog.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] ShadowCreature appears and takes a swipe at Yonas.

Text.Value: Wrong direction. Come into the light, hands high.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [HarperScouts] still aiming. [Yonas] repositioning to better aim at PLYR (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Yonas steps away from the group, raising his weapon to the player

Text.Value: The darkness can force rapid transfiguration? What magic is this?
Don't let it get hold of you. Harpers - now!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ShadowYonas] turns towards the PLYR, and shifts his advance specifically towards them. (HUM_M_Rig_SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_Yonas_toPLYR_Advance) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Yonas gives Tav a demonic scowl and advances on them instead.
EditorData.NodeContext: Urgent, creature is approaching player. Gestures to troops to attack creature.

Text.Value: Stay together! Keep to the light!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] walking through SCL. Try using DFLT_CINE_Walk_01 <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: From off-screen, as the player picks their way carefully through the dark, twisted terrain.
EditorData.CinematicObjects: Lassandra holds a torch and a sword.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Player is making their way through the terrain of the shadowlands.

Text.Value: Abandon them. Hope they die.
You're a chatty shadow, I'll give you that. Come out into the light - hands high.

EditorData.NodeContext: suspicious but the barest hint of amusement in the first line

Text.Value: An expert in magic. Perhaps I can aid you in traversing this darkness. What do you know of it?
Step out of the light and you're done for, freak. Fight with us or die in the dark. To arms! Now!

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

Text.Value: Whether we attack or not depends entirely on you, love. Come into the light - hands high.

EditorData.NodeContext: extra suspicious

Text.Value: First, come closer. Hands up.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [HarperScouts] still aiming. [Yonas] repositioning to better aim at PLYR (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*
EditorData.NodeContext: Suspicious
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Yonas steps away from the group, raising his weapon to the player

Text.Value: One who has sworn an oath to do no harm. Lower your weapons, please.
So you can fry us alive? I don't think so. Come into the light - hands high.
There you are... Come... Join me...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.NodeContext: Shadowcursed now. A horrible zombified version of himself
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Transformed into a shadow blight, Yonas speaks. Should have an effect on his voice.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Yonas appears transformed into a shadow blight.

Text.Value: Yonas is gone. All that remains is a monster - one I intend to kill.
All right, freak. Don't move.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [HarperScouts] still aiming. [Yonas] repositioning to better aim at PLYR (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*
EditorData.NodeContext: Player is being really weird and LAssandra is responding with profound suspicion.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Yonas steps away from the group, raising his weapon to the player

Text.Value: Peace - I am a druid. This land and its festering shadows - what do you know of it?
A ranger who knows the marks of a hunting party - what are you tracking?
I think we've just become prey. Stick together, stay in the light. No heroics.
I'm afraid poor Yonas is bait - and this is a trap.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [HarperScouts] walking (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_Walk_toStartled_toIdle). [PLYR] stops as they snap a stick. <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: In the darkness nearby, burning torches grow near, silhouetting a small knot of armed figures moving in a tight huddle. The player moves closer. A dead branch snaps underfoot, startling one of the figures - Lassandra, a wide-eyed young woman wearing half-plate under a blue cloak. She brandishes a torch and sword.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The player steps on a branch, which makes a large cracking noise.

Text.Value: I can't see anything. Something's wrong.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.NodeContext: Pained grunt in the middle, like he's being injured by the curse.

Text.Value: Who's there? Meg? Is that - argh!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.NodeContext: Pained; he's being transformed inside the curse.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Noises from the inside the darkness as Yonas is transformed into a shadow blight
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Yonas is transforming into a shadow blight inside the darkness. We don't see the transformation but maybe we see glowing from inside the darkness?

Text.Value: Guards up, everyone. I'm not letting the shadows take anyone else today.
Follow my voice. Come back to the light.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: Yonas...?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Meygan] has her torch held out. Idle Loop. (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_LookingForYonas) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Meygan is holding a torch
EditorData.NodeContext: Horror in her voice

Text.Value: An escaped lunatic. Be careful, or the madman will take over...
Stop - who's there?!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Yonas], with his bow drawn, starts to inch away from the light to get a bead on the PLYR. (SCENE_SCL_HarperScout_Yonas_Aiming) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Yonas (Harper 3) is moving wide of the group, an arrow notched to his bow, eyes fixed on the player. He's straying further from the Harpers' torches, walking along a sharp incline where road falls away, toeing the line between shadow and light.

Text.Value: A nightmare in the dark.
A paladin - one who will only take you down if you're foolish enough to strike first.
I'm here! Where are you?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.NodeContext: Calling from the dark

Text.Value: Try to save them, get ready to fight.
Yonas? Can you see our torches?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Meygan] starts down towards the incline, but [Lassandra] holds out a warning hand to halt her. (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_Lassandra_HaltsMeygan) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Megyn starts forward, but Lassandra holds out a hand to stop her.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Lassandra holds out a hand to stop Megyn approaching the fog

Text.Value: Move. I'll take care of this.
Harpers - to arms!

EditorData.NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

Text.Value: Yonas! Move in!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Yonas] is tumbled down the incline. (SCL_HarperScouts_Yonas_Fall).   [Harpers] react and move in together, facing the creature. (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_React_toCreature) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] ShadowCreature appears and takes a swipe at Yonas. Yonas dodges causing him to trip and fall down a hill into the fog.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] ShadowCreature appears and takes a swipe at Yonas. Yonas falls into the shadowcurse fog/darkness.

Text.Value: I serve the Platinum Dragon - I mean you no harm. Please, lower your weapons.
I'm but a lost Corellite - not an enemy. I beg of you, do not strike.
I'm a worshipper of Lady Silverhair - please, spare me your wrath.
Naught but one of the Priceless Gem's faithful - lower your weapons.
I walk in blood with Gruumsh. To attack me would be foolish.
I keep vigil for Helm - attacking me would be unwise.
I serve the Lord on the Rack - do not shoot. There is no need for wanton suffering.
I am a warden of Death - but I seek none here. Lower your weapons.
One of the Harsh's faithful, and I do not care to fight you. Stand down.
A servant of the Morninglord stands before you. I do not wish to fight.
Lower your weapons or feel the Mother of Spiders' prickly wrath.
One of Mielikki's faithful - I wish for allies in this warped place, not enemies.
I serve the Dwarffather - there is no need for violence.
I'm but a scion of the Weavemistress. I do not wish to fight.
I am a servant of Oghma - and us fighting would be unwise. Lower your weapons.
I walk in Selne's moonlight. I don't want any trouble.
I am one of the Storm Lord's adherents. Lower your weapons if you wish to live.
I serve the Lord of Battle. Raising arms against me would be foolish.
Lower your puny weapons before me. I serve the Dragon Queen herself.
For us to battle would be terrible luck. By Tymora's grace - stand down.
I am simply one of Justice's disciples. You can stand down.
One of the Undying Queen's faithful. Lower those weapons - for your own sakes.
I am a cleric of Yondalla - I mean you no harm. Let's talk, not fight.
I am but a faithful adherent - I do not wish to fight you.
I saw a 'simple monk' break a fella's spine once - hands where I can see them.

EditorData.NodeContext: suspicious

Text.Value: I'm a sorcerer, so kindly lower your weapons - or who knows what my magic might do.
I'm a sorcerer, so kindly lower your weapons or things might get ugly. Very ugly.
Get behind me - I'll protect you.
Now is not the time. Harpers, to arms!

EditorData.NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

Text.Value: Answer me!

Text.Value: This darkness is no natural plight - we must fight, or succumb to it too.
Try to slink back into the shadows.
Back away from them, palms up.
Enough not to trust a voice from the darkness. Come into the light - hands high.
Lower your weapon first.
[GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Man-at-arms. I mean you no harm.
[GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Woman-at-arms. I mean you no harm.
[GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Warrior-at-arms. I mean you no harm.
I find the best introductions are made while sitting around a fire, perhaps with drinks?

EditorData.stateContext: Lassandra is holding a torch and sword

Text.Value: Step out of the light and you're done for. It's fight or die. To arms! Now!

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

Text.Value: Stop - who's there?!

Text.Value: Not our style. Harpers - to arms!

EditorData.NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

Text.Value: Stop your mewling - it's time to fight or die. Choose.
Yonas? Yonas!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Meygan] & [Lassandra] go to the incline's edge and peer down with torches held. (SCENE_SCL_HarperScouts_LookingForYonas) <LoganP>

Synopsis: The player encounters a group of Harper scouts shortly after entering the Shadow-cursed lands. After being challenged by the scouts, they're forced to join sides as they're attacked by shadow creatures.
